kv8.9:1.1_0: Kusalena cittena samuṭṭhitaṁ kāyakammaṁ rūpaṁ kusalanti?
kv8.9:1.3_0: Sārammaṇaṁ, atthi tassa āvaṭṭanā ābhogo samannāhāro manasikāro cetanā patthanā paṇidhīti?
kv8.9:1.5_0: nanu anārammaṇaṁ, natthi tassa āvaṭṭanā ābhogo samannāhāro manasikāro cetanā patthanā paṇidhīti?
kv8.9:1.7_0: Hañci anārammaṇaṁ, natthi tassa āvaṭṭanā …pe… paṇidhīti, no ca vata re vattabbe—
kv8.9:2.1_0: Kusalena cittena samuṭṭhito phasso kusalo sārammaṇo, atthi tassa āvaṭṭanā …pe… paṇidhīti?
kv8.9:2.3_0: Kusalena cittena samuṭṭhitaṁ kāyakammaṁ rūpaṁ kusalaṁ sārammaṇaṁ, atthi tassa āvaṭṭanā …pe… paṇidhīti?
kv8.9:2.12_0: paññā kusalā sārammaṇā, atthi tāya āvaṭṭanā …pe… paṇidhīti?
kv8.9:2.14_0: Kusalena cittena samuṭṭhitaṁ kāyakammaṁ rūpaṁ kusalaṁ sārammaṇaṁ, atthi tassa āvaṭṭanā …pe… paṇidhīti?
kv8.9:3.1_0: Kusalena cittena samuṭṭhitaṁ kāyakammaṁ rūpaṁ kusalaṁ anārammaṇaṁ, natthi tassa āvaṭṭanā …pe… paṇidhīti?
kv8.9:3.3_0: Kusalena cittena samuṭṭhito phasso kusalo anārammaṇo, natthi tassa āvaṭṭanā …pe… paṇidhīti?

kv8.9:3.14_0: paññā kusalā anārammaṇā, natthi tāya āvaṭṭanā …pe… paṇidhīti?

kv8.9:4.3_0: Yaṁ kiñci kusalena cittena samuṭṭhitaṁ rūpaṁ sabbaṁ taṁ kusalanti?

kv8.9:17.5_0: nanu anārammaṇaṁ, natthi tassa āvaṭṭanā ābhogo samannāhāro manasikāro cetanā patthanā paṇidhīti?
kv8.9:17.7_0: Hañci anārammaṇaṁ, natthi tassa āvaṭṭanā ābhogo samannāhāro manasikāro cetanā patthanā paṇidhi;

kv8.9:18.17_0: anottappaṁ akusalaṁ sārammaṇaṁ, atthi tassa āvaṭṭanā …pe… paṇidhīti?

kv8.9:32.14_0: Akusalena cittena samuṭṭhitaṁ vacīkammaṁ rūpaṁ anārammaṇaṁ phassavippayuttaṁ abyākatanti?
kv8.9:33.6_0: Hañci kāyakammaṁ vacīkammaṁ kusalampi akusalampi, tena vata re vattabbe—
kv8.9:34.19_0: vāyodhātu asuci assu lohitaṁ sedo kusalopi akusalopīti?
kv8.9:37.5_0: cetayitvā kammaṁ karoti kāyena vācāya manasā”ti.
kv8.9:38.4_0: “kāye vā, ānanda, sati kāyasañcetanāhetu uppajjati ajjhattaṁ sukhadukkhaṁ;
kv8.9:38.5_0: vācāya vā, ānanda, sati vacīsañcetanāhetu uppajjati ajjhattaṁ sukhadukkhaṁ;
kv8.9:38.6_0: mane vā, ānanda, sati manosañcetanāhetu uppajjati ajjhattaṁ sukhadukkhan”ti.
kv8.9:39.4_0: “tividhā, bhikkhave, kāyasañcetanā akusalaṁ kāyakammaṁ dukkhudrayaṁ dukkhavipākaṁ;
kv8.9:39.5_0: catubbidhā, bhikkhave, vacīsañcetanā akusalaṁ vacīkammaṁ dukkhudrayaṁ dukkhavipākaṁ;
kv8.9:39.6_0: tividhā, bhikkhave, manosañcetanā akusalaṁ manokammaṁ dukkhudrayaṁ dukkhavipākaṁ;
kv8.9:39.7_0: tividhā, bhikkhave, kāyasañcetanā kusalaṁ kāyakammaṁ sukhudrayaṁ sukhavipākaṁ;
kv8.9:39.8_0: catubbidhā, bhikkhave, vacīsañcetanā kusalaṁ vacīkammaṁ sukhudrayaṁ sukhavipākaṁ;
kv8.9:39.9_0: tividhā, bhikkhave, manosañcetanā kusalaṁ manokammaṁ sukhudrayaṁ sukhavipākan”ti.
kv8.9:40.4_0: “sacāyaṁ, ānanda, samiddhi moghapuriso pāṭaliputtassa paribbājakassa evaṁ puṭṭho evaṁ byākareyya—
kv8.9:40.5_0: ‘sañcetaniyaṁ, āvuso pāṭaliputta, kammaṁ katvā kāyena vācāya manasā sukhavedaniyaṁ sukhaṁ so vedayati;
kv8.9:40.6_0: sañcetaniyaṁ, āvuso pāṭaliputta, kammaṁ katvā kāyena vācāya manasā dukkhavedaniyaṁ dukkhaṁ so vedayati;
kv8.9:40.7_0: sañcetaniyaṁ, āvuso pāṭaliputta, kammaṁ katvā kāyena vācāya manasā adukkhamasukhavedaniyaṁ adukkhamasukhaṁ so vedayatī’ti, evaṁ byākaramāno kho, ānanda, samiddhi moghapuriso pāṭaliputtassa paribbājakassa sammā byākaramāno byākareyyā”ti.
